content: i get a lot of questions all the time about how i knit my socks so i thought i d write up a pattern/recipe of how i do that and my way of knitting them two at a time i choose to knit my socks two at a time on magic loop but that does not mean you cannot use this pattern/recipe to make socks using whatever method of sock knitting you feel most comfortable with please feel free to let me know if you have any questions or queries about this pattern or any of the methods i describe within it i have created a short video on youtube 1 to help explain and demonstate how i manage my yarn while knitting socks to prevent the two cakes from getting tangled 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=piw_bframym
